text:
Hm? Is this... the postcard from that time?
Are you giving it to me?

During business hours...
I... wanted to convey my thoughts...

To convey to you, Producer-sama...
I wanted to express it... here...

(With such careful writing...
she must have really enjoyed this business trip.)

Thank you.
I'll read it carefully later.
Let's come here together again sometime, Rinze.
